biotools.summary:
A novel deep learning model for predicting phage-host interactions via multiple biological information.
Emerging evidence suggests that due to the misuse of antibiotics, bacteriophage (phage) therapy has been recognized as one of the most promising strategies for treating human diseases infected by antibiotic-resistant bacteria.
